About Me

BIO

Experienced Web Developer with a demonstrated history of working in the Software industry. Skilled in JavaScript, vanilla JS, OOP, SASS, React, Redux, ES6, Node.js, SPA Development, Unit testing and automation. Strong engineering professional with a Master's degree focused in INFORMATION SCIENCE from UNIVERSITY OF NORTH TEXAS.

MoneyGram International - USA

React/Node Developer
